unnormalised: I remember feeling overwhelmed during my final year at IIT Delhi. A friend suggested a mental health app. Honestly, I was skeptical, felt like a 3 Idiots plot twist! But, checking in daily helped me manage stress, almost like a virtual chai break for the mind. It wasn't a cure-all, but a good start.
normalised: I remember feeling overwhelmed during my final year at I I T Delhi. A friend suggested a mental health app. Honestly, I was skeptical, felt like a three Idiots plot twist! But, checking in daily helped me manage stress, almost like a virtual chai break for the mind. It wasn't a cure-all, but a good start.
